silverware.translation[0].definitions[0]: objects that are made of silver, for example dishes, plates, knives, forks etc
silverware.translation[0].definitions[1]: knives, forks, and spoons that are made of silver or a similar metal
silverware.translation[0].definitions[2]: a silver cup that a person or team wins in a sports competition
The club has not yet given up hope of ending the season with some silverware.
